blocks.subject: Weather Person for London EGM
text: We need to set a further round of inteviews for Tony Hamilton. Can everyone
let Gloria Solis know their availability over the next 2 weeks.  Below are
the results from our initial interviews and the candidate's resume

raw_header: ---------------------- Forwarded by Mike A Roberts/HOU/ECT on 12/15/2000

blocks.from: Tony Hamilton <th@mssl.ucl.ac.uk> on   Please respond to Tony Hamilton <th@mssl.ucl.ac.uk>
blocks.subject: Meteorologist/Forecaster
text: I would like to apply for the above position as advertised in "EARTHWORKS" and
enclose my full CV (In Word 97/00 format) in support.
I am currently a research Fellow with UCL conducting research, and building
forecasting models for the statistical prediction of North Atlantic Sea
Temperatures and other climatic parameters at long leads (1-12 months ahead of
I have recently applied this model to the North Sea in order to aid long-lead
forecasts of Fish Stocks (see SAP-symposium, 4-6 December, Bergen, Norway),
have recently been applying similar models to the North Atlantic Oscillation,
atmospheric phenomena which is strongly correlated with winter climate over
UK/Norway and NW Europe, particularly temperatures, rainfall and windspeeds
enclosed poster which was presented recently at an international conference on
As you will see from my CV, I have 2+ years experience consulting in several
areas of geoscience to the oil, gas and minerals industries and have good
programming skills, both on Unix machines and on PCs.
I am particularly keen to apply my skills in the commercial sector and
I look forward to the opportunity of hopefully discussing my skills further
* Department of Space and Climate Physics  *

blocks.subject: Weather Person for London EGM
raw_header: To: Jeffrey A Shankman/HOU/ECT@ECT, Chris Mahoney/LON/ECT@ECT, Mike A
Subject: Weather Person for London EGM
text: We interviewed three candidates. One of the three (Tony Hamilton)  seems to
be a very good fit within the Enron culture and values.
Vince, Mike and Jeff interview Tony via video conference or avistar
Driven - will be able to get the project off the ground quickly
Tony Hamilton is available for follow up interviews the first week of January.
